existing_features.title: Update the central contact configuration to support and expose two phone numbers: "+91 7734920728" and "+91 7297963005" (including correct `tel:` links), so UI components can render both numbers consistently.

Render both phone numbers (as clickable `tel:` links) anywhere the homepage currently displays a single phone number, including the top bar, footer contact area, and the contact section contact-info block.

Ensure all call-to-action elements that initiate a phone call (e.g., "Call Now" buttons/links) continue to work after adding the second phone number, with a clear, deterministic behavior (e.g., calling the primary/first number) and without broken links.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add two phone numbers (+91 7734920728 and +91 7297963005) to the homepage

projectName: Add two phone numbers across homepage contact sections
